items.question: What types of images work best for background removal?
items.answer: Clear images with distinct subject-background separation provide the best results. High-resolution images are preferred to ensure clean and accurate removal.

items.question: Can I edit the background after removal?
items.answer: Yes! After the background is removed, you can easily replace it with any background of your choice or leave it transparent for your projects.

items.question: Is the service suitable for bulk image processing?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our batch processing feature allows you to remove backgrounds from multiple images at once, significantly speeding up your workflow.

items.question: Are there any limitations on image types?
items.answer: Our tool supports various image formats including JPG, PNG, and TIFF. However, overly complex or low-resolution images may yield less satisfactory results.

items.question: How does the pricing work for the background removal service?
items.answer: We offer a flexible pay-as-you-go model. You only pay for the images you process, with a tiered pricing system based on volume.

items.question: What should I do if the background removal isn't perfect?
items.answer: You can manually edit the output using our simple in-app tools to ensure the results meet your expectations.

items.question: Can I use the images for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes! All images processed through our tool come with full commercial rights for use in advertising, social media, and online sales.

items.question: How long does the background removal process take?
items.answer: The process typically takes just a few seconds per image, allowing you to work efficiently and make quick updates.

items.question: What kind of support is available if I encounter issues?
items.answer: Our support team provides assistance via email and chat, along with a library of tutorials and documentation to help you maximize your use of the platform.

items.question: Is there a trial or free credits available to test the feature?
items.answer: Yes! New users receive free credits to try out the background removal service before committing to any purchases.
